Summary: took my dog out this morning and saw five ufo's
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Big Rapids
There were no other sightings in Big Rapids on or around September 26th 2008
divs: Sighting Detailsthis morning at approximately 6:25 a.m. i took my dog out. i was standing on the edge of a field next to the property facing east. suddenly i seen two bright lights flying from north to south, at a high speed, probably a couple hundred feet up. the second one was directly behind the first one. i stood there wondering what i just seen, when two more flew by going in the same direction, speed, and height. but the first one was not lit up like the others. instead it had a redish orange light on the front and one on the rear. the one behind it was like the first two that i saw. then about two seconds later i saw another one traveling just like the others except it just went up about 30 degrees and disappeared. none of these made any sounds. it was dark out, the weather was fair. visability was good.
